Author: Magehunter_Skassi

Comment: Not only was it passed so long ago, but nothing about the current system prevents them from having a database of every person with an ID, including photo, facial recognition, etc.   The states already share that whether you have real id or not. Thats how a cop that pulls you over 10 states away form your own can look up your DL, check for warrants, etc.  REAL ID is just about proving through a chain of documents  that you are who you say you are and a chain of verification steps happened. Basically everything we want as a pre-requesite to a national voter ID.  I don't get the outrage from some people on our side the past few weeks.
